intent_atoms.description: Provide a mechanism to export JSON snapshots for ISOInspectorKit tests
Snapshots must be stored in Tests/ISOInspectorKitTests/Fixtures/Snapshots/ with pretty-printed, sorted JSON
Snapshot update workflow requires running ISOINSPECTOR_REGENERATE_SNAPSHOTS=1 swift test --filter JSONExportSnapshotTests and reviewing regenerated files before re-running the suite
Combine-dependent benchmarks remain skipped on Linux containers
